Translations.Text: ane ame nuha a.Sa.Ne temani koma pase mokalya, te temani sathe navaso pacasa varsa rahya, pachi te lokone vavajhoda'e pakadi lidha ane te loko atyacari hatam
pachi ame temane ane hodivala'one chutakaro apyo ane a kis'sane ame samagra srstina loko mate sikhamana banavi didhi
ane ibrahima a.Sa.E pana potani komane kahyum ke allahani bandagi karo ane tenathi darata raho, jo tamaramam bud'dhi hoya to a ja tamara mate uttama che

tame allaha sivaya murti'oni puja kari rahya cho ane juththi vato upajavi kadho cho, sambhalo! Je lokoni tame allaha sivaya bandagi karo cho, te'o tamari rojina malika nathi, basa! Tame phakta allaha pase roji mango ane teni ja bandagi karo ane teno ja abhara mano ane teni ja tarapha tamare pacha pharavanum che
ane jo tame juthalavata hoya to tamara pahelani komo'e pana juthalavyum che, payagambarani javabadari to phakta spasta rite pahoncadi devani che
sum te loko'e nathi joyum ke allaha'e sarjanoni saru'ata kevi rite kari? Pachi allaha tene phari vara karase, a to allaha mate khuba ja sarala che

Kahi do, ke dharati para haripharine ju'o to khara ke kevi rite allaha ta'ala'e saru'atamam sarjana karyum, pachi allaha ta'ala ja navum sarjana karase, allaha ta'ala dareka vastu para sakti dharave che
jene icche tena para yatana mokale, jena para icche krpa kare, sau teni ja tarapha pacha pheravavamam avase
tame allahane na to dharatimam asamartha kari sako cho ane na to akasamam, allaha ta'ala sivaya ko'i tamaro vali nathi ane na madada karanara
